column1: Malicious Communications Act 1988 Sections (1 (1)(a) & (1)(b)) - Indecent or grossly offensive material
Communications Act 2003 (127 (1)(a), (1)(b) & (3))Grossly offensive or indecent communications
Communications Act 2003 (127 (2)(a), (2)(b), (2)(c) and (3)) - Causing annoyance, inconvenience or needless anxiety to another person
Criminal Justice and Immigration Act 2008 (63 (1), (7)(d) and 67(3)) - Possession of extreme pornographic images
